location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India.Distinctive Features:Sketch map issued as an ‘Appendix C Serial No. 12 D 3’ produced to illustrate an Operation Order No. 29 by Major-General G.F. Gorringe (pages 19-21) showing the position of enemy’s forces along River Euphrates with landmarks lettered for reference.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.In the left-hand corner: ‘S.D.O. No. 1358, September, 1915’.Oriented with west to the top.
